name: Poutine
description:
Poutine is the story of a young woman finding her first real job as told through the memory limbo of video games and service industry jobs many of us deal with right after graduating.

Developers Notes:

This was created using RPG Maker VX Ace (http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/products/programs/rpg-m...) over the period of 2 and a half days. I worked on this project on my own. Graphic and music assets were scrounged from the game environment itself and random places on the internet, but I designed the game play, wrote all of the dialogue, and scripted all of the events/programming logic that controls the flow of the game. There are three different sets of endings depending on how much of the game you complete. Average play-through takes just under 20 minutes. If you are a fan of this style of game, give it a go!

spoilers - I have a full play-through here if you get stuck -
